# Introduction

# Libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

# Import data

```{r}
cell_treatment_data<-read_csv("cell_treatment_data.csv")
```

# Plot data

```{r}
cell_treatment_data %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Group,y=Metabolic_Activity))+
  stat_summary(fun.data="mean_se",colour="Blue")+
  geom_point()
  
```

# T-Test

```{r}
cell_treatment_data %>%
  t.test(Metabolic_Activity~Group,data=.)
```
